GSD.description:
moxart: fix potential use-after-free on remove path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.100 by commit be93028d306dac9f5b59ebebd9ec7abcfc69c156. For more details please see the references link.
